    • informOfStartOfAuction

      public void informOfStartOfAuction(UUID uuid)
      Tell the node that we are starting an auction. This method returns after the node acknowledges that we are starting an auction.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The node whose messages we are going to auction.

    • informOfEndOfAuction

      public void informOfEndOfAuction()
      Tell the node that we are ending an auction This method returns after the node has

    • auctionMessage

      public boolean auctionMessage(Message message) throws InterruptedException
      Auction a message with this node This method takes care of sending out a bid for the message and takes care of the response
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be auctioned.
      Returns:
      True if we "won" the auction false otherwise
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • informOfMessageCreation

      public void informOfMessageCreation(Message message)
      Send a message to the node informing it that we created a message This is so that if we go down, someone has a copy of the message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message that we created.

    • informOfMessageDelivery

      public void informOfMessageDelivery(Message message)
      Inform the node that we delivered this message This is so that if we crash, this node knows that the message does not need to be delivered.
      Parameters:
      message - The message that we delivered.
